items.title: PN Gadgil Jewellers sets price band of Rs 456-480 a share for its IPO
items.description: The anchor bidding will start on September 9 and the issue will close on September 12. Allotment will be on September 13, refunds will be on September 17 and the stock will list on exchanges on September 18.

items.title: Live: Nifty Likely To Get Back To Winning Ways Amid Mixed Global Cues;Sona BLW In Focus|Opening Bell
items.description: The market closed off the day's low, halting its upward journey of the previous 14 consecutive days, on September 4. The Nifty 50 ended just below 25,200, down 81 points. Despite profit booking, the uptrend seems to be intact, and the index may march towards the 25,300-25,350 levels if it holds above 25,200 in the coming sessions, with immediate support at 25,100, experts said. This morning global cues are mixed with Nasdaq & S&P 500 booking back to back losses but Dow ekeing out gains. The GIFT Nifty is signalling a triple-digit rebound on the Nifty. Among stocks in focus today, watch out for Sona BLW, GIC Re and Suzlon among others. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Andrew Holland, CEO, Avendus Capital Public Markets Alternate Strategies and Brijesh Ail, Head Technical & Derivatives, Retail Research, IDBI Capital Markets and Securities. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Andrew Holland, CEO, Avendus Capital Public Markets Alternate Strategies and Brijesh Ail, IDBI Capital Markets and Securities. #sharemarket   #stockmarket #marketopening

items.title: Number of family offices in India see seven-fold jump in six years
items.description: The assets under management (AUM) of family offices in India is estimated to be around $30 billion, which is a fraction of the global AUM of family offices, which is around $6 trillion, as per a study by Sundaram Alternates.
